app.name: SortMii
app.long_description:
# SortMii This visualizes sorting algorithms on your Wii.
## Algorithms - Bubble Sort - Gnome Sort - Insertion Sort
## Controls - D-Pad Up and Down to incrase/decrease array size - D-Pad Left and Right to switch between algorithms
## Special Thanks This tutorial that really got me started: [Build a Sort Visualizer From Scratch in SDL2 | C++ Project](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V7Nyq6-dzCI)
